name: AmiRun
description:
Our hero Amitac is camping as there happens an accident in the nearby DEVLab. Suddenly nothing is like it was before, Amitac is standing in front of a huge joystick and he threatens him! Unfortunately he has no time for all this because he has to go to a party. So he faces the danger and sets off!

There is much danger on the way to the goal, but he can defend himself by drinking few beers to spit on the opponent or he uses dynamite to professionally blow up the opponents into handy sizes.

I tried to include as many Retrogame references as possible to build some easter eggs into the game. Feel warped back to the 80s / 90s  and find some classic gameplay ideas from the 8 and 16 Bit era. At its core it is a classic platformer game with pickups, opponents and traditional tilemaps to explore

Control our hero with Cursor Keys or WASD or  use a XBox controller,  Fire with " CTRL " key, set Dynamit with " Z " key und enter exit with " X " key

Please read the Read.me file for furter information.

In this preview version there are currently only 4 levels to test some gameplay functions and find bugs.  The final game will contain at least 10 levels and each level will have its own background music.
